Name: Kill Tiger
About the game: 'Kill Tiger' applies the traditional 2D scroll game, you will place yourself in the scenes which are full of oriental charms, And dodge various dangerous gears through the agile operation. And there are also the enemies of all forms and boss certainly, only by striking them down can you trace out the origin of truth.
